name: immich-power-tools
description: Immich Power Tools is a collection of maintenance and migration utilities for Immich. It provides scripts and helpers for tasks like deduplication, importing and cleanup, intended for administrators of large photo libraries.
features: Deduplication: Find and remove duplicate photos to save storage space.
Bulk Operations: Perform mass edits, moves, or deletions across your library.
Migration Tools: Import photos from other services or reorganize existing libraries.
Cleanup Utilities: Remove orphaned files and optimize database performance.
Batch Processing: Apply operations to thousands of photos efficiently.
Library Analysis: Generate reports on storage usage, duplicates, and library health.
Advanced Management: Tools for administrators managing large photo collections.
Immich Integration: Works directly with Immich API for safe, reliable operations.
